skillTree.name: Cold One
skillTree.description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Lustria, tempted from their tropical jungles to bear the Lizardmen to battle.

skillTree.name: Carnosaur
skillTree.description: The ultimate jungle hunters, these large, apex predators have terrorised the primordial jungles since the dawn of existence.

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +5%
	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Honoured Elder
skillTree.description: Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Forward Scout
skillTree.description: Though he may be hidden before battle is joined, he will not remain so for long.

skillTree.name: Commune with Beasts
skillTree.description: A veteran and master of the greatest dangers in Lustria.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Scorned
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen do not understand why, but something about this Scar-Veteran distracts them from their battle duties.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Obsinite Blade
skillTree.description: The Skink artisans will equip the most dangerous Scar-Veterans with the best equipment.

skillTree.name: Heirloom Shield
skillTree.description: Maintained for millenia by skink attendants within a pyramid-temple, this sacred shield will imbue its user with ancient power.

skillTree.name: Multichambered Lungs
skillTree.description: A useful evolution, present in the most advanced spawnings.

skillTree.name: Plated Scales
skillTree.description: Capable of swift healing, and protected from piercing.

skillTree.name: Apex Hunter
skillTree.description: A swift death to any who oppose the Great Plan.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Sacred Adornments
skillTree.description: The sight of such an honored warrior inspires the enemy to fight with great determination, for to slay him would be to demoralize and disrupt the Lizardmen host.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Revered Leader
skillTree.description: Standing proud amongst his kind, this Scar-Veteran has survived countless wars.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -4% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -8% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Combat Reflexes
skillTree.description: Without thought, without understanding, this Saurus instinctively fights and leads his brethren to fight with incredible skill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ferocity of Age
skillTree.description: No Saurus has ever died of old age. The longer they live, the stronger they become.

skillTree.name: Hunter's Instinct
skillTree.description: The prey, entrapped, will soon be slaughtered.

skillTree.name: Commence the Massacre
skillTree.description: A Saurus is calm and still. Until it isn't.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +20% when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: We are the Elite
skillTree.description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.description: Hidden skill to grant Kroq'Gar's Saurus characters extra scaling

backgroundSkills.name: Arrogant
backgroundSkills.description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

backgroundSkills.name: Humble
backgroundSkills.description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

backgroundSkills.name: Pompous
backgroundSkills.description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: "The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Perfect Spawn
backgroundSkills.description: Very rare spawn of self-healing Saurus.

backgroundSkills.name: Leader of His Kind
backgroundSkills.description: Saurus gather around him.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Saurus units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -4% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Dino Rider
backgroundSkills.description: Spawned to lead giant monsters.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Stegadon, Bastiladon, Terradon & Carnosaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master Survivor
backgroundSkills.description: Alone in the jungles of Lustria for many years he watches.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Skaven Bane
backgroundSkills.description: A living terror in the mind of his enemies.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Skaven
Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Skaven

Income from post-battle loot: +5% against Skaven
	(own characters in province)
